roleset.name: clean a surface of liquid, cleaning with a mop
roleset.note: MOP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mop' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from mop.01-v predicate notes)
MOPPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from mopping.01-n)

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: Never once did she gasp for air or mop her brow .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: That would be a massive nuclear strike , incincerating all opposition before it could mobilize , and using its new warfighter technology to mop up everything else .
